definition: full moon/to hope/to expect/to visit/to gaze (into the distance)/to look towards/towards

sentences.english: Some desires are formed as the result of rational thought pro-  cesses.
sentences.chinese: 有些慾望在理性的思考後產生。

sentences.english: Thank god I no longer feel this erotic desire.
sentences.chinese: 感謝主，我已不再有性慾望了。

sentences.english: Damon combines his moviemaking talents with his desire to help others.
sentences.chinese: 戴蒙將製作電影的才能和幫助他人的慾望結合在一起。

sentences.english: Their desire for expansion has increased.
sentences.chinese: 他們的擴張慾望有增無減。

sentences.english: Falling in love is the paradigmatic example of  an involuntary  life-affecting desire.
sentences.chinese: 墜入愛河是一個慾望不由自主影響人生的經典案例。

sentences.english: One final characteristic of a lustful relationship is that it is typically short lived.
sentences.chinese: 最後，慾望關係的一大特徵是短命。

sentences.english: However, Ibrahimovic says he lacks the desire to start afresh.
sentences.chinese: 但是，伊布表示他缺乏接受新挑戰的慾望。

sentences.english: But he also believes that Rooney must rein in his desire to play.
sentences.chinese: 但他也相信魯尼鼻息控制自己比賽的慾望。

sentences.english: Desire. It's an emotion designed to lead us astray.
sentences.chinese: 慾望，是誘惑我們誤入歧途的情感。

sentences.english: Just what is this desire, this wish that Xie Nanxing brands 'romantic'?
sentences.chinese: 謝南星評價爲“浪漫”的這種慾望或希望到底是什麼？

sentences.english: This helps fight off the urge to curl back up under the blankets and fall back asleep.
sentences.chinese: 這能幫你擊退縮回毛毯下睡覺的強烈慾望。

sentences.english: All this leads to fewer cravings for sugar and the body’s ability to handle it as well.
sentences.chinese: 這些都有助於減少喫糖的慾望和提高身體的處理能力。

sentences.english: In other words: one must not inconsiderately pester the cause of desire.
sentences.chinese: 換句話說，我們一定不要冒失地騷擾這個慾望的原因。

sentences.english: Young men and women must quench their desire to marry early in life.
sentences.chinese: 青年男女一定要剋制早婚的慾望。

sentences.english: In a word, the characters reflect each other's desires with an extremely introspective attitude.
sentences.chinese: 畫中人以某種極端內省的姿態照映出彼此的慾望。

sentences.english: Not all men lose the desire for sex when their testosterone levels drop -- but many do.
sentences.chinese: 部分而非所有的男性都會喪失對性的慾望。

definition: to have an urge/to be impetuous/impulse/urge
